comment: There is a bug I suppose. When I put a custom background on the watchface, the am and battery percentage indicator cast a kind of shadow, towards the right, which is kind of annoying.  Otherwise this is the watchface I was looking for.

author: Frank Provenzano
comment: Exactly what I was wanting and it installs directly onto my watch from the Google Play store with in my Android Wear 2 watch. Thank you!  I would like the ability to display a leading zero when using the 24-hour display option. Where can I donate to your project?

author: Stacy Hughes
comment: Exactly what I was looking for LOVE IT and you can put any photo as background... This is the BEST app for your smartwatch. 10 stars if I could.

author: Henry Chelston
comment: This is the best watch face so far I found., the only issue is in ambient mode, there is a white line on the top left and it drives me crazy...it sometimes goes away but it does reapear.

reply.author: Marcel Dopita
reply.content: It's a feature calling "Battery line" which you can disable in watch face settings.

author: Nasir Khan
comment: Simple and easy to read. I think it's less battery intensive as well.

author: Youssef Chammas
comment: This is the best digital watch face on the play store. very simple very customizable can even change the font and font size thank you very much

author: Enzo Zappulla
comment: No widgets. Nothing better than the stock faces

author: Thomas Galea
comment: New Favourite
I used to customise fonts, but with the recent updates whenever I tried to change the font it say TTF file not found, otherwise all good....
title: Fonts

author: Michelle
comment: Love this so much. Battery lasts longer and love everything about it. Would be fab if you could add steps to this? Also if you were able to move the time to another place on the screen as it's covering my photo a bit to much. Best I've seen yet tho!💗

author: Nick Chalmers
comment: Love this watch face but please please make the battery level brighter in both ambience and full on modes. It's one of the key things I love. The face is uncluttered and so easy to read.

author: David Filskov
comment: Ambient notifications becomes invisible when colors are black on white and custom colors are impossible to set right in ambient. Also ambient battery font is unreadably thin.
title: Bug: Ambient notifications white on white

author: Kenn Adayo
comment: Makes my Sony Smartwatch 3 go up to 3 days without charge!
title: Super Battery Friendly

comment: Does not work at all on my LG GWR with android wear2 and MM 5.1.1 on Xperia M2

author: Dave Gravel
comment: Simple but efficient watch faces, would give 5 if you added more backgrounds and fonts.

author: Chris Templeton-Crosby
comment: The simplest of designs which is great. But wish I could use custom Fonts.

author: Chris Aton
comment: Does not work

author: Are Espelid Wold
comment: Absolutely fantastic on the Smartwatch 3. Thank you for creating this!

author: Scott Beery
comment: Very nicely done very easy to customize

author: Vern Rolton
comment: Nice would be perfect if it showed steps

author: Mohamad Abaspor
comment: The best

author: Darryl Spong
comment: I love it's simple easy to read design and it gets frequent useful updates.
title: Love this watchface

author: Phil Severn
comment: Love it. The best and most flexible watch face I've found so far.
title: Absolutely Brilliant

author: Parvinder Pangotra
comment: Made my watch vry mch different from regular 1
title: Loved it

author: Aqua Jim
comment: Quick and to the point with no clutter.  The Apps Select Font button does not work right on my phone.  It goes to gallery.  Can you make an option to remove the AM and PM?

reply.author: Marcel Dopita
reply.content:
It can go to gallery but should allow you to go anywhere (to phone's file storage) and select the desired file.
Option to not display am/pm seems perfectly valid to me. I will try to include that in one of the next updates.

title: Easy to Read

author: Graham Nind
comment: Other watch faces have lots of fancy features but the icons and text are tiny. With this one I can see the time without putting my glasses on!
title: Perfect

author: Richard Eglen
comment: I use this on my sony smartwatch 3. Had it as the face for a long time now. Clear and simple is what makes it great.
title: Great watch face

author: Chris Vasta
comment: This is the default watch face that all Android Wear makers should've installed by default.
title: Perfect

author: Mike K
comment: It took me 3 months to find this watch face. It's surprisingly difficult to find a simple watch face that gives you the time in a 24 hour format. If possible I would add an option for weather.

reply.author: Marcel Dopita
reply.content: I'm waiting for Android Wear 2.0 which will offer Watch Face Complications allowing displaying info from any compatible provider. I will try to implement that after updates will be available some time next year.

title: Clean and easy to read

author: David Vahl
comment: This is exactly what I was looking for.  The numbers are large and the display is easy to read. I only planned on using it once in awhile, as I have other "fancy" watch faces I can use, but I just never turn it off.
title: Nice Face

author: Ferdinand Mudjialim
comment: but this is by far the best feature-filled watch face I have ever seen! Try it out and see for yourself :)
title: I don't usually write reviews...

author: Mark H
comment: The big numbers (scaled at 110%) are ideal. Easily configurable. Perfect for the Sony SmartWatch 3.
title: Clean and easy to read in ambient mode

author: edmund ong
comment: I was looking for a watch face that had seconds on it and this is the only one I found. Thank you soo much.
title: Best watch face

author: Mark Grant
comment: Simple, clean and does the job brilliantly
title: Brilliant

author: Austin Lai
comment: Nice and simple. Thanks!

author: igor samkov
comment: The best  for SW3

author: Fabio Cabral
comment: Simple, excellent

author: stu pot
comment: Good

author: Miles Andrew2
comment: Hello, thank you for your benevolent work free$ and ad free dev contribution to android wear users.  It feels opensource it is so honest. Could you please add a button for the ability to donate, the year in the date text and separate  large battery indicators for phone/ watch. Excellent readability of the design.
title: Thank you dev!
